documents.document: So how do I thread tweets? https://t.co/ZtYNmfwGIy
@driverminnie happy birthday! Congratulations on the year you made show about disability that disabled people actually like!
@TheTonyCoffey Hi Tony. Would like to talk to you about your show. email your number to emma.tracey@bbc.co.uk. Ta.
@Sheila700Scott Possibly didn't express myself well. I don't love social media accounts run by humans on behalf of animals.
@Sheila700Scott sorry to hear that. I have an incredible guy dog Varona who I love to bits.
This boy talks with his eyes. https://t.co/vcyrhx8vge
@ju90artist Popped in to Twitter for procrastination purposes and am now sorry didn't say Graham Norton's mammy on the NTAs.
@knight_millie Congratulations Milly!
@juliakite Hi Julia. But I'm in Scotland now.
"if someone will be at your house for 15 minutes at 6pm to help you to the loo, you’d better not be late." https://t.co/TBZnCI7lIE
@writerlyderv Hi. Let me know how it goes. All good here. Yourself?
Westport residents plagued by calls to X-rated Babestation https://t.co/J0Hkmfw0Cu
@GeorgeFielding1 Oooh thanks. I totally have a girl crush on that fabulous woman.
Didn't even know DMs could be open. https://t.co/t6JcxuFT5F
@emmavogelmann Good for you Emma. It takes energy and massive will to complain each time.
@MikScarlet What a shame.
@MikScarlet What on earth prompted that?
@lisybabe Oh god I totally missed this story. Thanks Lisa.
@MarianKeyes Oh, Just putting it out there, Shelley Atkinson who read The Glorious Heresies is an exceptional narrator.
@MarianKeyes Lovely! I could listen to you all day. Can't wait for the new book. unabridged Audio at same time as hardback pleeeeeease!!!!
@KaraLG84 yes. I think you are right. And I don't think it tells you if a video or audio is attached anymore
@louisemcsharry Some of that is singing instructions and digs at your partner in a lullaby tone.
Doug Paulley's blog is well worth a read. https://t.co/rIfdq8FBoE @kingqueen3065
@OrnaMulcahy @IrishTimesLife subs need another glance over this f ttypos and repeated words.
@BendyGirl all good here. Hopefully there is no need to be anxious and they can easily see you're a great mum and d… https://t.co/5QmFK7ryNT
This is good on epilepsy, pregnancy and love. https://t.co/cfm4HMTaje
@williamkremer gives you the rage doesn't it?
@BendyGirl oh my God that's so exciting! Well done you. I'm so pleased.
Fairplay Mandy. https://t.co/Db8WYMeX6V
Doug Paulley is a bit of a legend and it's nice to see Nikki Fox on the 10. #disability
@Shannonemurray amazing! Thanks for sharing.
@sheilaoflanagan because you have to constantly wash cloth's, which is a pain.
Something in my eye https://t.co/btYnaYSKdC
@howardhardiman Cool. Just let me know when the alt tags are ready.
@howardhardiman Hi Howard. Did I see you have created a new game for people with chronic pain? If so, tell me more please.
The latest Untold from @BBCRadio4 has epilepsy, pregnancy and a gorgeous love story. https://t.co/lRppS9A58e
As a fellow blind person, this woman's description of sexual asault is so upsetting. https://t.co/gnGbkAExkp
@SimonMHall that's going to be in my head all afternoon now.
I keep hearing #CBB as #CBeebies. #screenreaderproblems #dontevicttumble
@IrishTimesNews Central Mental Hospital? Seriously? Is that what it is called?
@selinalitt Good point but I thought snow held the title because it has a blanketing effect.
Hopefully with more accessibility for blind users. Just because it's very visual doesn't mean we don't want a shot. https://t.co/fzW2ipSvO9
Interesting that Nintendo's new hardware is called the Switch. Switches make games consoles accessible for disabled people
What's your least fav weather as a disabled person and why? We're talking about blind man's fog, or snow, on the podcast today.
@BendyGirl we had children's services in but were comfortable and happy to prove we had everything in hand in that… https://t.co/ni803bP5Xy
I produced this but the guests and presenters make it really awesome! Take a listen if you get a chance. https://t.co/cIJYp9NQ75
@ms_molly_vog Fav foods. Bing Bunny, stickers, paper and colouring in stuff.
All about the audio. As it should be. https://t.co/fw4hAqRP9w
This is very exciting. https://t.co/JdRUZYt5ZG
@rogsawyer Everywhere I came upon it online showed a photo of the text, which I can't access. Thanks.
@rogsawyer Thanks! Maria B read your reply out in a voice message to me. It's perfect.
@byrnemaria Thanks X.
@GidsG @guardian Love this Gids. Thanks for sharing. X
@rogsawyer Thank you very much. I'll share it with the original post so other blind people can read it too.
@mrdiscopop My husband @robinspinks knows every word of the song.
@mrdiscopop Oh god. 19 months and Tadhg has it as an earworm. "Go, Jettas go. dee dee dee."
@mrdiscopop Haha. Are you in the same boat?
@CBeebiesHQ Our 19-month-old wants Go Jetters Christmas ep on repeat. Only acceptable alternative is the Komodo dragon.
@BBCRadio4 is Phoebe's letter printed in full anywhere? Blind people can't read photos of text. #missingout
@clive_gardiner Absolutely loving AD on Netflix.
@lisamareedom And they aren't even blind. But I actually am. What was the pic you sent?
@lisamareedom Blind as a bat I'm afraid.
@crazyhelen09 I give up. Losing at Twitter today. that tweet was clearly not meant for you.
@ImaanStandup The @RNIBShop website is actually tricky to use with Jaws and Windows. #wheresthesearch?
@fitzpatrickd Right. And is that better than one of those eg moulds or have you tried them? Very cheap and with a handle thing sticking up
@digitaldarragh I'm not naturally patient but being a parent is different.
@digitaldarragh @fitzpatrickd Not sure how to take that.
@fitzpatrickd What skill would you show me or what would you teach me to cook if I popped by with a recorder?
@TonyBainz Katherine and Joe in Last Chance Saloon was the first sex scene I ever read and I still love it.
@damonrose No. In the microwave.
@nickykealy @digitaldarragh @barkingbabs1971 @muzobazz #proudofyoounicholas
@digitaldarragh Next time I'm over, we should record you teaching me how to fry an egg.
@digitaldarragh @muzobazz @barkingbabs1971 It can stick to the rim and burn.
@digitaldarragh @barkingbabs1971 @muzobazz @nickykealy Did Nicholas actually use it?
@barkingbabs1971 @muzobazz No Barbara, I can't . Never order them in front of people I don't know.
@muzobazz @barkingbabs1971 Yep. I'm a bit afraid of frying.
@j0ekenny The response to my tweet suggests there's ann apetite. Get it?
@muzobazz @barkingbabs1971 I'm not a massive fan either but think that's because I'm so slow and it is exhausting.
@j0ekenny Hahaha. So Irish. It's all about the work-arounds.
@barkingbabs1971 Interesting. I'm wondering if mmaybe it'd be presenter led with lots of different cooks?
@barkingbabs1971 I hear ya barking. Did you ever hear Janet Tuggy's AudioBooms? Straightforward recipes for cheesecake, brownies, curry etc
@barkingbabs1971 Totally. I sometimes feel like there are absolute basics I don't know because I've not seen others do them.
@FVSensoryCentre Hi. Would he talk to me about it do you think?
Blind people, if there was a cookery show made for you, would you listen? And what would you want it to sound like?
@crossantravels I think these tweets are what the kids call a meem. Sue Purkins tweeted one about New York.
@RNIBRadio But I'd love an actual cookery show with talking equipment and tips on the basics from blind cooks.
@RNIBRadio Please serve me up a blind-friendly cookery podcast. Thanks!
Poetry helps the Reids cope with Paul's MS. Meet them on Facebook at 3 PM. https://t.co/gwh1tTRqkQ
@AndyMcNib @Coach_Kelvin @RTEdoconone @boreenbroadcast It is audio and it is accessible from everywhere so get listening.
@boreenbroadcast could you follow me for a DM about your brilliant documentary please?
No Time to Lose is a superb radio doc about epilepsy, running and being a teenager. @RTEdoconone @boreenbroadcast https://t.co/YDuRjzPOuk
Isn't it great that Gilmore Girls is just immediately there on #Netflix with #audiodescription ? So easy to access.
Listen: The lovely @Stuarthypnotist on how hypnosis helps him and others live with chronic pain https://t.co/vme9IPDgE1
@MarcSettle Let us know how you get on.
@OJdoherty Good for you. Hope you had a meat feast for dinner last night.
@Vibeke_Venema That's a clicker.
@JohnCleese And blind people. And severely dyslexic people or anyone with a print disability.
@MarcSettle I tried it on the phone but will give the watch a go this evening.
@MarcSettle Haven't tried sharing options or the transcription feature yet.
@MarcSettle Definitely. Simple interface. Gesture for recording from anywhere. Beeps when you record and stop.
